roleset.name: use one's tastebuds, active perception of flavor
roleset.note: TASTE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls see-30.1, stalk-35.3. (from taste.01-v)
TASTE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on taste-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls see-30.1, stalk-35.3. (from taste.01-n)

example.name: nasty trace chains
example.text: ``Parties are rather a state of mind, '' [she]-3 said, [*-3]-4 pausing only [*-4] to taste [*RNR*-1] and pass judgment on [the Georgian shashlik]-1 (``a little well done, but very good'').

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Ms. Morgan is really insulting all the troops who 've been there to assume that by going for ten days and taking a few casual leisurely trips outside the Green Zone that she got a full taste of combat

example.name: both args
example.text: Diminutive Vanderkitten Road Sprinter Starla Teddergreen pinned on the numbers for her first taste of mud racing

example.name: LVC
example.text: Oh man , that is creepy . Farmers mkt sounds good ! They 're doing a tomato tasting ! What time are you thinking ?

roleset.name: possess a flavor
roleset.note: TASTE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls stimulus_subject-30.4. (from taste.02-v)

example.name: beautiful metaphor
example.text: They still buy apples mainly for big, red good looks -- that's why so many taste like woodchucks' punching bags.
